law.catch_line: New bonds may be issued for mutilated, lost or destroyed bonds.
law.text: The department may issue new bonds in lieu of bonds mutilated, lost or destroyed under such terms and conditions as it determines.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356s-32.
